org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header

Class SamProgramBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header.SamProgramBuilder

  • public final class SamProgramBuilder
extends Object
    Builder is the Builder object used to create SamProgram instances.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SamProgramBuilder(SamProgram copy) 
      SamProgramBuilder(String id)
      Create a new Builder object that will be used to create a new SamProgram instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header.SamProgramBuilder.SamProgramImpl build()
      Create a new SamProgram instance using the fields set so far.

      Get the Commandline invocation of the program.

      Get the unique ID.

      Get the name of the program.

      Get the Id of the previous SamProgram that operated on this SAM file.
      String getVersion()
      Version of the program.
      SamProgramBuilder setCommandLine(String commandLine)
      Change the command line of the program, if not called, then the built SamProgram.getCommandLine() will return null.
      SamProgramBuilder setDescription(String description)
      Change the description of the program, if not called, then the built SamProgram.getDescription() will return null.
      SamProgramBuilder setId(String newId)
      Change the unique ID.

      Change the name of the program, if not called, then the built SamProgram.getName() will return null.

      Change the previous program id of the program, if not called, then the built SamProgram.getPreviousProgramId() will return null.
      SamProgramBuilder setVersion(String version)
      Change the version of the program, if not called, then the built SamProgram.getVersion() will return null.

      • SamProgramBuilder

        public SamProgramBuilder(String id)
        Create a new Builder object that will be used to create a new SamProgram instance.
        Parameters:
        id - the SamProgram id to use; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if id is null.

        Get the name of the program.
        Returns:

        Change the name of the program, if not called, then the built SamProgram.getName() will return null.

        Get the Commandline invocation of the program.

      • getPrevousProgramId

        public String getPrevousProgramId()
        Get the Id of the previous SamProgram that operated on this SAM file.
        Returns:
        an Id String or null if this is the last (or only) program in the chain.

      • setPrevousProgramId

        public SamProgramBuilder setPrevousProgramId(String prevousProgramId)
        Change the previous program id of the program, if not called, then the built SamProgram.getPreviousProgramId() will return null.
        Parameters:
        prevousProgramId - the previous program id to set; may be null.
        Returns:
        this

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Get the unique ID. The value of ID is used in the ReservedSamAttributeKeys.PROGRAM tag. PG IDs may be modified when merging SAM files in order to handle collisions.
        Returns:
        a String; will never be null.

      • setId

        public SamProgramBuilder setId(String newId)
        Change the unique ID. IDs may be modified when merging SAM files in order to handle collisions.
        Parameters:
        newId - the new SamProgram id to use; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if newId is null.

      • build

        public org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header.SamProgramBuilder.SamProgramImpl build()
        Create a new SamProgram instance using the fields set so far.
        Returns:
        a new SamProgram instance; will never be null.
